title: Headline and Summary for an External Wire Story
description: An editor needs to take a story from a wire service (like AP or Reuters), write a new headline and summary for it, and publish it on their own site.

tasks.description: Read the wire story to understand its key points.
Write a new, original headline that fits the publication's tone and style.
Write a brief summary to be used as a teaser on the homepage.
tasks.expected_outcome: A concise and engaging summary is drafted.

tasks.description: Publish the wire story with the new headline and summary to the CMS.
tasks.expected_outcome: The story is published on the site.
